Writing About

About LinLib

Wine education and exploration

LinLib is a wine and cocktail education platform dedicated to helping people understand, appreciate, and enjoy drinks. Whether you're exploring these for the first time or looking to deepen your knowledge, you'll find thoughtful essays, practical guides, and explorations here.

My Mission

Wine can feel intimidating or overly complex. LinLib exists to demystify wine and make it accessible to curious people. Through clear writing and genuine exploration, I aim to help you build confidence in your wine journey.

Get in Touch

Questions, suggestions, or want to chat about wine? Reach out at contact [at] leonlins [dot] com

About Leon Lin

LinLib is created and maintained by Leon Lin. Learn more about Leon at leonlins.com.
